author: dylhunn
message:
release: cut the v13.1.0-next.3 release (#44334)

PR Close #44334

files.patch: @@ -1,3 +1,57 @@ + +# 13.1.0-next.3 (2021-12-01) +## Deprecations +### +- The `downgradeModule` function calls with NgModule factories are deprecated. Please use NgModule class based `downgradeModule` calls instead. +### common +- `TestRequest` from `@angular/common/http/testing` no longer +accepts `ErrorEvent` when simulating XHR errors. Instead instances of +`ProgressEvent` should be passed, matching with the native browser behavior. +### +| Commit | Type | Description | +| -- | -- | -- | +| [dbc46d68b9](https://github.com/angular/angular/commit/dbc46d68b99f5516209991ee3421292fc8261bec) | docs | deprecate factory-based signature of the `downgradeModule` function
